languages.text: "У меня... Плохие новости, Лорд-капитан. Паника, а может, и вредоносное влияние силы, что обрушилась на экипаж через воксы, ввергла малообразованную чернь в панику и паранойю. По какой-то трагической причине они решили, что в происходящем виновны адепты культа Омниссии, и перебили всех, до кого смогли добраться. Без защиты и помощи экипаж техотсека понес ужасающие потери".

"I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."
languages.original_text: "У меня... Плохие новости, Лорд-капитан. Паника, а может, и вредоносное влияние силы, что обрушилась на экипаж через воксы, ввергла малообразованную чернь в панику и паранойю. По какой-то трагической причине они решили, что в происходящем виновны адепты культа Омниссии, и перебили всех, до кого смогли добраться. Без защиты и помощи экипаж техотсека понес ужасающие потери".

traits.locale_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered mob drove it to paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everybody they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the crew of technical chamber suffered tremendous losses."

languages.text: “我有个……坏消息，舰长大人。层甲板那些目不识丁的乌合之众可能受到了音阵系统的邪恶影响，陷入了偏执的狂热之中。出于某些令人遗憾的原因，他们认为欧姆尼塞亚的神职人员是这件事情的始作俑者，于是他们屠杀了遇到的每一位技师。维修甲板的工作人员由于缺乏足够的帮助与保护，遭受了惨重伤亡。”
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."

traits.locale_text: “我有个……坏消息，舰长大人。层甲板那些目不识丁的乌合之众可能受到了音阵系统的邪恶影响，陷入了偏执的狂热之中。出于某些令人遗憾的原因，他们认为欧姆尼塞亚的神职人员是这件事情的始作俑者，于是他们屠杀了遇到的每一位技师。维修模块的工作人员由于缺乏足够的帮助与保护，遭受了惨重伤亡。”

languages.text: «Tengo... malas noticias, Lord Capitán. El pánico, o posiblemente la influencia nociva del poder que llegó a la tripulación por los vocos, ha hecho que la plebe analfabeta sea presa de los nervios, desatando un frenesí paranoico. Por algún motivo que desconozco, han decidido que los adeptos del Omnissiah eran responsables de lo sucedido y masacrado a todos los que han podido. La tripulación de la bahía de mantenimiento, indefensa y sin ayuda, ha sufrido cuantiosas bajas».
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo... malas noticias, Lord Capitán. El pánico, o posiblemente la influencia nociva del poder que llegó a la tripulación por los vocos, ha hecho que la plebe analfabeta sea presa de los nervios, desatando un frenesí paranoico. Por algún motivo que desconozco, han decidido que los adeptos del Omnissiah eran responsables de lo sucedido y masacrado a todos los que han podido. La tripulación del módulo de mantenimiento, indefensa y sin ayuda, ha sufrido cuantiosas bajas».

languages.text: "Ich habe ... schlechte Nachrichten, Lord Captain. Die Panik oder der verderbliche Einfluss der Macht, von der die Crew über die Voxsignale befallen wurde, hat den ungebildeten Pöbel in eine paranoide Raserei versetzt. Aus irgendeinem tragischen Grund haben sie die Adepten des Omnissiah als Verantwortliche ausgemacht und wahllos abgeschlachtet. Ohne Hilfe und Schutz hat die Crew des Wartungsmoduls schwere Verluste erlitten."
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."

traits.locale_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance module crew suffered tremendous losses."

languages.text: « J'ai... une mauvaise nouvelle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La panique, ou peut-être l'influence pernicieuse qui s'est infiltrée par le biais des vox, a fait basculer la racaille subalterne dans une fureur aveugle. Pour une raison tragique qui reste à déterminer, ces idiots ont décidé que les adeptes de l'Omnimessie étaient la cause de leurs maux et ont massacré tous ceux qui leur sont tombés sous la main. Privé d'aide et de protection, le personnel de la baie d'entretien a subi de lourdes pertes. »
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... une mauvaise nouvelle, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. La panique, ou peut-être l'influence pernicieuse qui s'est infiltrée par le biais des vox, a fait basculer la racaille subalterne dans une fureur aveugle. Pour une raison tragique qui reste à déterminer, ces idiots ont décidé que les adeptes de l'Omnimessie étaient la cause de leurs maux et ont massacré tous ceux qui leur sont tombés sous la main. Privé d'aide et de protection, le personnel du module d'entretien a subi de lourdes pertes. »

languages.text: 「残念ながら…悪いお知らせです、ロード・キャプテン。パニックが原因か、あるいはヴォクス越しにクルーへと届いた邪悪な力の影響か、思慮に欠ける暴徒たちは苛立ち、被害妄想に駆られて狂乱状態に陥りました。そして何か悲惨な理由により、彼らは万機神のアデプトを元凶と見なし、手の届く限りの者を虐殺したのです。助けも守りも得られぬまま、メンテナンスベイのクルーは甚大な損害を被りました。」
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら…悪いお知らせです、ロード・キャプテン。パニックが原因か、あるいはヴォクス越しにクルーへと届いた邪悪な力の影響か、思慮に欠ける暴徒たちは苛立ち、被害妄想に駆られて狂乱状態に陥りました。そして何か悲惨な理由により、彼らは万機神のアデプトを元凶と見なし、手の届く限りの者を虐殺したのです。助けも守りも得られぬまま、メンテナンスベイのクルーは甚大な損害を被りました。」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan... Kötü haberlerim var. Panik nedeniyle veya belki de mürettebata vokslar aracılığıyla ulaşan gücün kötücül nüfuzu nedeniyle, okuma yazma bilmeyen ayaktakımı galeyana geldi ve paranoyakça bir öfkeye tutuldu. Trajik bir şekilde nedense Hermesih'in üstatlarına suç atıp ellerine geçirebildikleri herkesi katlettiler. Yardım veya koruma alamayan bakım bölmesi mürettebatı, büyük kayıplar verdi."
languages.original_text: "I have... bad news, Lord Captain. The panic, or perhaps the pernicious influence of the power that reached the crew via the voxes, riled up the unlettered rabble, driving them into a paranoid frenzy. For some tragic reason, they decided the Omnissiah's adepts were to blame and slaughtered everyone they could reach. Devoid of help and protection, the maintenance bay crew suffered tremendous losses."
